The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Friends of The British School,
Here is some information from our friends at The Guangzhou Football Academy:
Welcome back!
We hope you have had a great summer and have been inspired to get serious about football by this year's World Cup!
Our Autumn term programme starts on Thursday 28th August.
Please come and join our exciting programme, which includes organised matches and a high level of professional training, for all age groups and ability levels.
Please feel free to browse our website: www.hongkongfootballacademy.com
For more information, please CLICK HERE or contact us directly via email enquiry@hkf-academy.com or phone +86 159 2076 1172
Thanks and best wishes,
The British School of Guangzhou
